Uses of Class
JavaCool303.Cool303Component

    • Uses of Cool303Component in JavaCool303

      Subclasses of Cool303Component in JavaCool303 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Cool303Box
      A Cool303Box is a visible container, which, by being a subclass of Cool303Container, can contain Cool303Components and Cool303Containers.
      class  Cool303Button
      A Cool303Button is a Cool303Component wrapper for Swing's JButton.
      class  Cool303Container
      A Cool303Container is a generic container, based around an AWT Container, that holds Cool303Components.
      class  Cool303Frame
      A Cool303Frame is a special wrapper around a JFrame that holds and displays a single Cool303Box (which itself is a wrapper around a JPanel).
      Methods in JavaCool303 with parameters of type Cool303Component 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Cool303Container.addComponent(Cool303Component c)
      The 'addComponent' method inserts a Cool303Component at the next open position in the grid layout.
